Limited relief at night with low temperatures 63 to 71 degrees. * WHERE...Clarkston, Chelan, Oroville, Gifford, Pangborn Airport, Peck, Omak, Entiat, Quincy, Number 1 Canyon, Wenatchee, Number 2
entry.cap:areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area

entry.summary: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Cedar Creek Burn Scar in... West Central Okanogan County in north central Washington... * Until 300 PM PDT Saturday. * At 1251 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fremont County through 300 PM MDT... At 224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Torrey Lake, which is also 7 miles south of Dubois, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Funnel cloud
entry.cap:areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
